name: Antidaeon
effect: C:35 P:60 W:40 S:70
With thousands of hidden waterways linking the OverWorld and UnderWorld, Antidaeon remains in constant alert against enemy invasion.

name: Arctus, Heptadd's Squire
effect: C:100 P:50 W:75 S:40
At the beginning of combat, Arctus gains all Elemental Types your adjacent Creatures have.
As Arctus launched his Allmageddon attack, Bodal calculated that in 14.9 seconds, Rath'tab would become a very wise pool of blue jelly.

name: Armor of Earthen Might
effect: Equipped Creature with Earth takes 10 less damage from Mugic and activated abilities.
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.

name: Aszil, the Young Queen
effect: C:80 P:30 W:85 S:35
At the beginning of combat, Danians you control gain Earth.
Hive: Mandiblors you control have "Earth 5."
Unique, Loyal
Queen of the Danians. Ruler of the Hive. Fate of Perim.

name: Bidua
effect: C:70 P:30 W:70 S:85
Expend Earth while engaged: The opposing engaged Creature loses Invisibility. (As a cost to play this ability, this Creature loses Earth.)
With his keen eyesight, Bidua can see even the faint shimmering of invisible Mipedians.

name: Bodal, Flamedrill Researcher
effect: C:50 P:20 W:80 S:30
Expend Earth: Return target Battlegear in your discard pile to play equipped to another unequipped Creature you control.
Expend Fire: Destroy a Battlegear you control. If you do, destroy target Battlegear.

name: Carnival of Confusion, The Entangled Throne
effect: When an attack is played, flip a coin. If heads, that attack deals double damage. If tails, that attack deals 0 damage.
Here your fate rests with your fortune.

name: Carniwin
effect: If there are an odd number of Creatures in play, deal 10 damage.
If there are an even number of Creatures in play, deal 10 non-attack damage to your engaged Creature.

name: Cyrenox
effect: C:50 P:75 W:30 S:50
While all Creatures you control have Fire, Cyrenox deals an additional 5 damage with attacks.
Born of darkness, raised in gloom, wielder of sorrow, bringer of doom.

name: Droskin
effect: Sacrifice Droskin: Negate target attack. Play this ability only if the equipped Creature is engaged.
Unique
The Droskin is rumored to be able to absorb even the most devastating attacks.

name: Emberwhip
effect: Emberwhip deals an additional 10 damage if the opposing engaged Creature has Water.

name: Epaluo
effect: C:40 P:30 W:75 S:60
Invisibility: Strike 5 (This Creature deals an additional 5 damage with its first attack each combat against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Invisibility: Surprise (This Creature wins initiative checks against Creatures without Invisibility.)

name: Ettala, Mind Controlled Brute
effect: C:50 P:85 W:40 S:30
Earth 5 (Earth attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
Brainwashed

name: Gaffat-ra
effect: C:40 P:100 W:100 S:50
Defender: Conjuror
Non-attack damage dealt to adjacent Royals is dealt to Gaffat-ra instead.
Recklessness 10
Unique, Loyal
As the war turns grim, even Royals have begun to accept the Warbeasts.

name: Ginar'rash, The Extinguisher
effect: C:50 P:75 W:70 S:30
Fireproof 20
When Ginar'rash deals Water attack damage to a Creature, that Creature loses Fire.
"Some say to fight fire with fire. My plan works much better, I assure you.

name: Heptadd
effect: C:50 P:50 W:50 S:50
Heptadd may play Mugic of any tribe.
Unique, Loyal
Some in Perim believe that Heptadd knows where the Cothica is.

name: Ikkatosh, The Aich King
effect: C:30 P:20 W:80 S:40
At the beginning of combat, if your engaged Creature has no Elemental Types, it gains 20 Energy.
Unique
The Aich King brings the power of nature even to those who cannot touch it themselves.

name: Irsenog
effect: C:75 P:60 W:30 S:40
Air 5 (Air attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
Few realize his claws are as sharp as his serrated blade until it is much, much too late.

name: Kapalor
effect: C:60 P:75 W:40 S:30
Kapalor has an additional 5 Energy for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play.
While Kapalor is unequipped, it has an additional 10 Energy.

name: Malvadine, The King's Herald
effect: C:75 P:40 W:35 S:90
Invisibility: Strike 10
While you control a Royal, Malvadine has "Defender" and "Air 5."
"We shall claim this city for Mipedim as we await King Theb-saar's return!"

name: Maxxor, Elemental Champion
effect:
100c 50p 70w 50s

Expend Fire: Maxxor does an additional 10 damage with his next attack.

Expend Earth: Reduce the damage dealt to Maxxor by the next attack by 10.

name: Nunk'worn
effect: C:50 P:70 W:70 S:45
Fluidmorph
Attacks played by Nunk'worn also count as Fire and Water attacks.
If Nunk'worn has exactly 3 Mugic counters on it when it is defeated, you may return it to play in an open space on your side of the Battleboard with no Mugic counters.
Unique

name: Opto
effect: C:70 P:50 W:50 S:40
At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with Scouts you control lose and cannot gain Invisibility.

name: Prince Mudeenu, Champion of the Guard
effect: C:85 P:40 W:20 S:80
Mipedians you control have "Invisibility: Surprise."
Unique, Loyal
"You can either surrender or die... and I won't accept your surrender."

name: Raimusa
effect: C:60 P:60 W:40 S:45
The vicious winds of the Crystal Range slash the flesh but sharpen the soul.

name: Riggan
effect: C:65 P:40 W:65 S:35
Expend Earth while engaged: The active player reveals a new active Location. (As a cost to play this ability, this Creature loses Earth.)
As the first through the Tremor Gate, he was the first to learn its secrets.

name: Silchaw's Mine
effect: Attacks that would deal more than 20 damage to Creatures with Earth deal 20 damage instead.
Since Aszil opened the Tremor Gate, the very bedrock of Silchaw's mine has gone mad!

name: Simalin
effect: C:70 P:50 W:40 S:60
The first attack against Simalin each combat deals 20 less damage.

name: Takinom, The Shadowknight
effect: C:50 P:90 W:40 S:70
Strike 10 (This Creature deals an additional 10 damage with its first attack each combat.)
1MC: The next attack made by Takinom counts as its first attack this combat.
Swift 2
Unique, Loyal

name: Tangath Toborn, OverWorld General
effect: C:55 P:75 W:95 S:35
Defender
On an opponent's turn, Tangath Toborn has
• "Fire 5" if you control an UnderWorlder.
• "Disarm" if you control a Mipedian.
• "Elementproof all Elemental Types 5" if you control a Danian.
Legendary

name: Tassanil, High Elementalist
effect: C:65 P:40 W:70 S:40
Expend any Elemental Type: Target Danian gains the expended Elemental Type. Use this ability only once per turn.
Unique, Loyal
"Challenge me!? That's like challenging nature itself!"

name: The Flame Gate
effect: All attacks count as Fire attacks.
"Maybe we should look for another way in."

name: The Indigo Arc
effect: Equipped Creature's first attack each combat has "Untargetable."
Unique
The blade cuts with such force that neither armor nor Mugic can slow its strikes.

name: Wamma, Flame Guard
effect: C:70 P:65 W:40 S:25
Defender: Fire
Defender: Earth
When assigned a task, Wamma feels obligated to do a good job... at least for an hour.
